mapper.update: UPDATE yb_appeal_result INNER JOIN yb_reconsider_apply_data ON yb_reconsider_apply_data.id = yb_appeal_result.applyDataId INNER JOIN yb_reconsider_apply ON yb_reconsider_apply.id = yb_reconsider_apply_data.pid INNER JOIN ( SELECT yb_reconsider_reset_data.id, yb_reconsider_reset.applyDateStr, yb_reconsider_reset_data.billNo, yb_reconsider_reset_data.serialNo, yb_reconsider_reset_data.projectCode, yb_reconsider_reset_data.projectName, yb_reconsider_reset_data.ruleName FROM yb_reconsider_reset_data INNER JOIN yb_reconsider_reset ON yb_reconsider_reset_data.pid = yb_reconsider_reset.id WHERE yb_reconsider_reset.applyDateStr = #{applyDateStr} ) rrd ON rrd.billNo = yb_reconsider_apply_data.billNo AND rrd.serialNo = yb_reconsider_apply_data.serialNo AND rrd.projectCode = yb_reconsider_apply_data.projectCode AND rrd.projectName = yb_reconsider_apply_data.projectName AND rrd.ruleName = yb_reconsider_apply_data.ruleName AND rrd.applyDateStr = yb_reconsider_apply.applyDateStr SET yb_appeal_result.resetDataId = rrd.id, yb_appeal_result.resetPersonId = #{resetPersonId}, yb_appeal_result.resetPersonName = #{resetPersonName}, yb_appeal_result.resetDate = #{resetDate} WHERE yb_appeal_result.STATE = 1 AND yb_appeal_result.resetDataId IS NULL AND yb_reconsider_apply.applyDateStr = #{applyDateStr}
